sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_hr_sp.TodoNonTaskTablesDefault</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Implements extension point sn_hr_sp.TodoNonTaskTables</description>
        <name>TodoNonTaskTablesDefault</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var TodoNonTaskTablesDefault = Class.create();
	TodoNonTaskTablesDefault.prototype = {

		getTodoTables: function() {
			var extensions = new GlideTableHierarchy("task").getAllExtensions();
			extensions.push("sysapproval_approver");
			extensions.push("sn_hr_integrations_todo_inbound");
			if (new GlidePluginManager().isActive("com.sn_jny"))
				extensions.push("sn_jny_journey");
			if (new GlidePluginManager().isActive("sn_dlir"))
				extensions.push("sn_dlir_incident");
			return extensions;
		},

		type: 'TodoNonTaskTablesDefault'
	};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-08-08 07:27:43</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0dae193b99cddd10f87751af990331d8</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>TodoNonTaskTablesDefault</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Employee Center Core" source="sn_hr_sp">3d1da2705b021200a4656ede91f91ab6</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Employee Center Core">3d1da2705b021200a4656ede91f91ab6</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0dae193b99cddd10f87751af990331d8</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-08-08 07:28:22</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
